alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Harding County through 1130 PM MDT... At 1029 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Table Mountain, or 12 miles southwest of Bowman, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ludlow, Ralph, Ladner, Table Mountain, South Cave Hills, North Cave Hills and Lake Gardner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for northwestern South Dakota.
